channel.title: CVE Feed for QOS.CH Sarl -- logback
channel.description: The latest CVEs for QOS.CH Sarl -- logback

item.title: CVE-2023-6378|2024-08-02T08:28:21.757Z -- qos.ch%20sarl -- logback
item.description: A serialization vulnerability in logback receiver component part of logback version 1.4.11 allows an attacker to mount a Denial-Of-Service attack by sending poisoned data.

item.title: CVE-2023-6481|2024-08-02T08:28:21.829Z -- qos.ch%20sarl -- logback
item.description: A serialization vulnerability in logback receiver component part of logback version 1.4.13, 1.3.13 and 1.2.12 allows an attacker to mount a Denial-Of-Service attack by sending poisoned data.
